mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( product_category_parent, product_category_median, product_name, product_detail, product_price, product_business_profits, product_net_profit ) VALUES( #{product_category_parent}, #{product_category_median}, #{product_name}, #{product_detail}, #{product_price}, #{product_business_profits}, #{product_net_profit} )
mapper.update: update product set product_code=#{product_code}, product_category_parent=#{product_category_parent}, product_category_median=#{product_category_median}, product_name=#{product_name}, product_detail=#{product_detail}, product_price=#{product_price}, product_business_profits=#{product_business_profits}, product_net_profit=#{product_net_profit} where product_code=#{product_code}
